phone_start.text: As you pick up the handset and put it to your ear, you hear a woman's voice on the other end. "Hello?"

phone_branch_1.select_text: "Hello, this is the office of William Steward, private detective. How can I help?"
phone_branch_1.text:
The woman hurriedly responds, "This is Jane Evans, I scheduled a consultation with you yesterday, my apologies for not being able to come in person."
Considering your rather bedraggled form, you quietly think that not being seen is for the better.

phone_branch_1_1.select_text: "Not a problem, Miss Evans. Now what did you need consulting about?"
phone_branch_1_1.text: "There's been a break-in at one of my employer's office branches nearby," she says, "and you're wanted to investigate."

phone_branch_1_1_1.text: The voice responds "Oh, I thought you knew! My employer is McMiller Shipping International."

phone_branch_1_1_2.select_text: "Why are you not going to the police for this?"
phone_branch_1_1_2.text: "We'd like to keep this quiet if possible. Having the police look through our building doesn't give the best of looks," the woman answers, curtly.

phone_branch_1_1_3.select_text: "What are the details of this break-in?"
phone_branch_1_1_3.text: "I'm not allowed to go over all the details until you agree to investigate. However, what I can tell you is that it seems to have been a fairly benign burglary, likely aimed at taking any cash that could be found inside. Nothing of extreme value was stolen, regardless," Evans says at length.
